Appearance
Rooven
Appearance
Overview
Covers light and dark themes, as well as color modifications to help you create a visually appealing and consistent user interface.
• Light and Dark themes will seamlessly adapt based on the system default theme.
• Automatic adjustment ensures a harmonious user interface, whether your system is set to light or dark mode.
• The @media (prefers-color-scheme: light/dark) CSS query applies styles based on the user's light or dark system theme.
See it in action: switch your browser theme to light or dark mode.
Google Chrome
1. Open Chrome and click on the three vertical dots in the top-right corner.
2. Select Settings.
3. Under Appearance, click on Theme.
4. Choose Dark from the available themes.
Mozilla Firefox
1. Open Firefox and click on the three horizontal lines in the top-right corner.
2. Select Add-ons and themes.
3. Click on Themes on the left side.
4. Choose Dark and click Enable.
Microsoft Edge
1. Open Edge and click on the three horizontal dots in the top-right corner.
2. Select Settings.
3. Click on Appearance.
4. Under Overall appearance, select Dark.
 
            
:root {
  --primary:      #0d6be6;
  --secondary:    #4a4df5;
  --info:         #0f9af0;
  --successful:   #00b067;
  --warning:      #ffb432;
  --danger:       #c83d42;
  --toast:        #2d2d2d;
  --online:       #02d144;
  --offline:      #dbdbdb;
  --code-snippet: #050911;
  --code:         #a0c2fd;
  --transparent:  #00000000;
  --overlay:      #040404a1;
  --love:         #ed4d62; 
  --luxury:       #ffa552;
  --cravings:     #ef3e36;
  --crimson:      #e60914;
  --white:        #ffffff;
  --black:        #000000;
  --gray:         #808080;
  --lightgray:    #d3d3d3;
  --darkgray:     #a9a9a9;
}
• Default color scheme
 
            
@media (prefers-color-scheme: light) {
  :root {
    --default:         #e8e8e8;
    --card:            #ffffff;
    --heading:         #001b3b;
    --title:           #131313;
    --subtitle:        #4b4b4b;
    --description:     #2f2f2f;
    --placeholder:     #777777;
    --line:            #e5e5e5;
    --hover:           #d8d8d8;
    --receiver:        #ededed;
    --border:          #b9b9b9;
    --icon:            #2c2c2c;
    --disabled:        #e2e2e2;
    --skeleton:        #d8d8d8;
    --skeleton-loader: #e7e7e7;
  }
}
• Light color scheme
 
            
@media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) {
  :root {
    --default:         #090b0e;
    --card:            #111316;
    --heading:         #e6e6e6;
    --title:           #f5f5f5;
    --subtitle:        #e9e9e9;
    --description:     #d6d6d6;
    --placeholder:     #6e6e6e;
    --line:            #23232e;
    --hover:           #171a1f;
    --receiver:        #181b20;
    --border:          #33383f;
    --icon:            #f2f2f2;
    --disabled:        #17181d;
    --skeleton:        #1b1c22;
    --skeleton-loader: #23262b;
  }
}
• Dark color scheme
